page.title: 20MADONNA HOUSE
page.content: { Madonna House}is a house for the homeless people who have had problems in their life. The{Hereford Diocesan Council for {social action}saw the urgent need to provide a suitable home for single people which would be so much more than merely a hostel.A place to foster a sense of community among the residents leading to shared activities while allowing them privacy of a single bedroom. Residents meetings are held occasionally where people have an opportunity to air their views and help shape the community into one where problems and insights can be shared. Staff operate their own mini_bus service into Hereford and many make use of this facility on a daily basis.
